body:
@tgamblin tells me that a bunch of folks are here!

I explicitly remember hearing about @alalazo, @adamjstewart, @mplegendre, and @becker33.

I'd like the opportunity to see people face-to-face. We should have a spack dinner or lunch Today, Thursday, or Friday.

If you know about other spack people here, loop them in!

My first proposal, is dinner tonight!
title: Spack meetup at SC17
